nodes.text: A female was once involved with the Human brothers Vallkos and Mallikhan. She was the cause of a fierce rivalry between the siblings, each of whom was the leader of a pirate group—the Crimson Stars and the Ebon Strikers, respectively—based on the Unknown Regions planet Volik. Eventually, the conflict between the two gangs came close to an explosive outbreak of violence.
A group of individuals sought out the female during that time in order for her to help them mediate the situation on Volik.
